reviewText:
This is brief summary of  "Classic Fables Films Children's Stories".

I bought this disk for the various Ray Harryhausen (RH) sequences.  These include the 4 shorts in the RH Mother Goose series (Little Miss Muffet, Old Mother Hubbard, The Queen of Hearts, and Humpty Dumpty).

I found the video and audio quality of this disk to be a little better than  "Fairy Tales Favorites"  which I also own; and it contains many of the same RH stories.

The RH stories are captivating:  my 3 year old, my 7 year old, and I all enjoyed them.  If you haven't seen these, you should get this disk.  Although other disks, of lesser quality, have more RH material.

This dvd didn't actually come in any professional packaging but it was playable and the quality was excellent. The children I babysit for were very entertained and the price for the dvd was reasonable.
